html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07452024-06-20GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Haiti) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (HAITI) REGULATIONS in order to add three (3) individuals to the list of sanctioned persons under the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0144 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (HAITI) REGULATIONS in order to add three (3) individuals to the list of sanctioned persons under the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
